column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The trio of dips and pizza chips was the absolute best decision ever. Get this
column3: your stomach might regret it when you need to unbutton those pants) But seriously
column4: this appetizer is what I'd give Lou Malnati's a 5 stars for! The crispy pizza chip were like a soft pita chip that held all the dips very well. They were all topped with its own herbs
column6: and chopped tomatoes too. But the real winners here are these dips: roasted garlic
column9: each of them were so delicious and flavored with my favorite being the artichoke dip for sure. I was honestly satisfied just having this dip and chips already.
